scripts.prepare-build: echo 'Preparing (clean, Env, babel)...' && npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production babel lib --out-dir dist
scripts.copy: cp package.json dist/. && cp README.md dist/. && cd lib && find . \( ! -name '*.original.css' -a \( -name '*.css' -o -name '*.png' -o -name '*.svg' \) \) | cpio -pdm ../dist && cd ..
scripts.build: echo 'Building...' && npm run prepare-build && npm run copy
